long_description: This 2-person Lifeline Disaster kit is stocked with essential supplies such as food, water, first-aid items and tools to help you get through 72 hrs. following a major emergency. All items are packed into a rugged backpack, making the kit easy to take along on your travels. Nutrition items include two 2,400-calorie food bars and 24 drinking water pouches. First-aid items include bandages, dressings, wound closure strips, sterile gauze pads, knuckle bandages, sting relief pads, triple antibiotic ointment and ibuprofen packets. Also has acetaminophen packets, antihistamine packets, hydrocortisone cream, alcohol prep pads, antiseptic towelettes, iodine prep pads, tweezers, safety pins and moleskin. Plus, vinyl gloves, cotton-tipped applicators, adhesive tape and hand wipes. Hygiene items include tissues, toothbrushes, toothpaste, bar soap, combs, shampoo, sanitary pads and dust masks. Survival tools include a heavy-duty backpack, survival booklet, a tarp, duct tape, PVC tape, gloves with dimples, garbage bags, 2-gal. water bag and a rechargeable flashlight. Glow sticks, survival blankets, emergency ponchos, hand warmers, multifunctional tool, waterproof matches, emergency candles, cable ties and a 5-in-1 whistle. Lifeline Disaster kit also includes an AM/FM radio and 2 AAA batteries.
short_description: This 2-person Lifeline Disaster kit is stocked with essential supplies such as food, water, first-aid items and tools to help you get through 72 hrs. following a major emergency.
